entry.title: FOG ADVISORY ENDED, Parry Sound
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Parry Sound Harbour 11:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
Temperature: 2.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 90 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Fog patches dissipating near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 31 December 2022
